about_the_game:
Are you ready to discover SCP-682's full potential?

Have you wondered what this immortal lizard look like if she evolved endlessly?

Anomaly Evolution is a strategy clicker game where your goal is to evolve our lizard mommy from a single cell to an immortal Lovecraftian god!

How to Play

As I've mentioned, Anomaly Evolution is a clicker game in which you main click on your creature and generate "cells", which are your primary currency in the game.

You can then use cells to unlock new ways of generating cells at a larger and faster rate, repeating an endless cycle of anomalous growth! You'll also need to unlock more features and types as you grow. These are the current types in the game:

  • Proteins: You use them to increase the maximum level capacity of your upgrades.

  • Neurons: You need them to multiply the amount of cells you gain from each click.

  • Genes: These are needed to increase the amount of cells you gain from clicking. The more genes you have, the more cells you gain.

  • Morphogens: Uses neurons to generate more cells.

  • Tissues: Each tissue is an auto clicker.

  • Enzymes: You need them to increase your damage against the hostile Xenocytes.

  • Evocytes: Special immortal cells that you need to "TRANSCEND"

Transcendence:

This is a mechanic in the game in which you reset your current progress and growth in exchange for a permanent boost in all cell production rates, including your evocyte production.

Evocytes are gained from killing Xenocytes, which are hostile cells that appear in the game. They can be killed by clicking them.

Features:

  • 1 evolving creature! (more will be added!)

  • 32 evolutionary transformations (more will be added!)

  • 5 bonus unlockable nsfw scenes (more will be added!)

Will you able to reach all of her 32 evolutionary forms?

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains sexual scenes with anthropomorphized monsters as bonus unlockable rewards for progression.

name: Anomaly Evolution

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Support for OpenGL 2.1
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Support for OpenGL 3.3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
